description: Ms. codex. Title from leaf 2a, line 14. Physical description: 25 lines per page; written in naskh (switches to nastaʻliq on leaf 329a) in black on glazed, laid Arabic paper. Rubrication and catchwords; marginal notes. Marginal damp-staining, a few repairs, ragged edges. Many leaves are detached. Origin: According to Āghā Buzurg, work was completed in 1075 H [1664 or 1665]. Incipit: الحمد لله الذي نور روضة الدين البهية الزاهرة
author: Ibn Zayn al-Dīn, ʻAlī ibn Muḥammad, approximately 1604-1691 or 1692
abstract: Volume 1 of a gloss on al-Shahīd al-Thānī's commentary on al-Lumʻah al-Dimashqīyah; breaks off in the middle of Kitāb al-ḥajj.
extent: 345 leaves : paper ; 250 x 185 (187 x 99) mm bound to 250 x 194 mm
title: al-Zaharāt al-dhawīyah fī al-Rawḍah al-bahīyah
uniform title: زهرات الذوية في الروضة البهية. جلد 1
provenance: Owner's note on front flyleaf. Owners' notes and stamps, one of which is dated 1197 H [1782 or 1783] on leaf 1a.
creator: ابن زين الدين، علي بن محمد،, approximately 1604-1691 or 1692
subject: Shahīd al-Thānī, Zayn al-Dīn ibn ʻAlī, 1506-1559—Rawḍah al-bahīyah fī sharḥ al-Lumʻah al-Dimashqīyah
binding note: Cloth and leather over boards; front cover detached.
member of collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
